name: OTP-less one tap Sign in
author: OTPless

sections.description:
Truly Password-less & OTP-less One tap login. Add mobile & email based social login instantly.
OTPLESS transforms user authentication with truly password-less & OTP-less logins. Users can login into any WordPress store with just one tap, enhancing user experience and boosting login conversions. We support Sign in with WhatsApp, Google, and Apple for mobile and email-based authentication. Adding password-less login to your WordPress store is as easy as installing this app! No setup required.

✓ Login with WhatsApp, Google and Apple with just on e tap

✓ Get more customers by improving login conversion and user experience

✓ Add OTPLESS in a single click with automated setup & installation

✓ Free forever, for unlimited users.

✓ White labelling and custom branding options available
sections.installation:
Requirements

To install OTP-less, you need:

  • WordPress Version 5.5.1 or newer (installed)
  • PHP Version 7.4 or newer

Instructions

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  3. Search for the OTPLESS plugin.
  4. Click on Install Now and wait until the plugin is installed successfully.
  5. You can activate the plugin immediately by clicking on Activate now on the success page.

This plugin relies on a third-party service for [specific functionality or purpose]. The service is used to [process authentication or provide certain data].

Note that this external service is essential for the proper functioning of the plugin and is used in the following scenarios: [authentication of users].

You can find more information about the third-party service we use by visiting OTP-less.

Before using this plugin, we recommend reviewing the terms of use and the privacy policy at Terms of Use & Privacy Policy.
sections.faq:
How do I configure the modes of authentication?

You can configure the modes of authentication i.e. WhatsApp, Google, and Apple or just one from the OTPLESS dashboard. To view the dashboard, download the OTPLESS app from the Play Store.

What should I do if I need help with this plugin?

If you run into any problems or have any queries about our plugin, feel free to send us an email at help@otpless.com. If you prefer, you can schedule a call with our tech experts. We’re here to help make your experience with our plugin as seamless as possible.
sections.reviews:
Amazing Plugin & Support

By industrialtex on June 7, 2023

The plugin does what it promises. The support team is awesome. Special mention to Megha and Bhumit for listening to the issues I was facing with the plugin and providing a solution in no time.

I surely recommend this to anyone looking for a seamless sign-in solution for eCommerce.

Give it a try, and you won't be disappointed!

By ankitkullu on May 29, 2023

As an avid WordPress user, I recently came across the OTPless plugin, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for my website's user authentication process. OTPless provides a seamless and secure way to log in to WordPress without the hassle of one-time passwords (OTPs). In this review, I'll share my experience with OTPless and explain why it's an invaluable addition to any WordPress site.

User Experience and Convenience: OTPless plugin offers a refreshing alternative to traditional OTP-based login systems. It eliminates the need for users to wait for and enter a temporary code sent via SMS or email, streamlining the login process. With OTPless, users can directly log in with their username and password, saving time and effort. The plugin seamlessly integrates with WordPress, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free user experience.

Enhanced Security: One might wonder if removing OTPs compromises security. However, OTPless does an excellent job of maintaining the security of user accounts. It utilizes advanced encryption algorithms and robust security protocols to protect against unauthorized access.

User Management: Managing user accounts becomes more convenient with OTPless. The plugin provides an intuitive interface for managing user roles, permissions, and access. From the WordPress dashboard, you can easily add, edit, or remove user accounts and set their login preferences. OTPless simplifies user management, saving time for administrators and ensuring a smooth user onboarding process.

Support and Documentation: OTPless offers excellent support and comprehensive documentation. In case you encounter any issues or have questions, their responsive support team is quick to assist. The documentation is thorough, providing step-by-step guides and FAQs that cover most common scenarios. Even WordPress beginners can quickly grasp the plugin's functionalities with the help of OTPless's well-documented resources.

Conclusion: In conclusion, I highly recommend OTPless for WordPress users looking to enhance their login process while maintaining a high level of security. This plugin revolutionizes the user experience by eliminating the need for one-time passwords and streamlining the login process. With OTPless, you can save time, enhance security, and provide your users with a seamless login experience. Give it a try, and you won't be disappointed!

This is one of the best easy login option for users

By easynotes4u on May 4, 2023

This is one of the best easy login option for users, the user easily get in to website and access the contents within 5 seconds. and it also helpful for increase the userbase and the website traffic in less time. Overall the best.

Nice pluggin

By herbalji on April 18, 2023

Nice Pluggin, but
1) No function to place it on website as per admin choice. as it comes over my website's login button.
2) No function to enable/disable it on PC/Mobile.
3) Not working on PC. It's only for mobile visitors.
